rbiom 1.0.3.9088
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Split BIOM by metadata, apply function, and return results in a data frame.

Source: R/bdply.r
bdply.Rd

Calls plyr::ddply internally.

Usage

bdply(biom, vars, FUN, ..., fast = TRUE)

Arguments

biom

A BIOM object, as returned from read_biom.

vars

A character vector of metadata fields. Each unique combination of values in these columns will be used to create a subsetted BIOM object to pass to FUN. If NULL, biom will be passed to FUN unaltered. Unambiguous abbreviations of metadata fields are also accepted.

FUN

The function to execute on each BIOM subset. FUN should return a data.frame, all of which will be rbind-ed together before being returned from bdply.

...

Additional arguments to pass on to FUN.

fast

If TRUE (the default), the subsetted BIOM objects will still contain the full taxa table and phylogenetic tree. Set fast = FALSE to run the slow steps of subsetting these elements as well.

Value

A data.frame comprising the merged outputs of FUN, along with the columns specified by vars.

Examples

    library(rbiom)
    
    bdply(hmp50, "Sex", nsamples)
#>      Sex V1
#> 1 Female 30
#> 2   Male 20
    
    bdply(hmp50, c("Body Site", "Sex"), function (b) {
      ad <- adiv_table(b)[,c("Shannon", "Simpson")]
      apply(ad, 2L, mean)
    })
#>      Sex      Body Site   Shannon   Simpson
#> 1 Female Anterior nares 1.4318071 0.6814534
#> 2 Female  Buccal mucosa 1.1739844 0.4080621
#> 3 Female     Mid vagina 0.4070774 0.1670592
#> 4 Female         Saliva 2.9304968 0.8934531
#> 5 Female          Stool 2.4288307 0.8496172
#> 6   Male Anterior nares 1.5053133 0.6650060
#> 7   Male  Buccal mucosa 1.7128815 0.6016869
#> 8   Male         Saliva 3.1718522 0.9132980
#> 9   Male          Stool 2.5126148 0.8347696
    
    bdply(hmp50, "Body Site", function (b) {
      r <- range(bdiv_distmat(b, "bray"))
      data.frame(bray.min = r[[1]], bray.max = r[[2]])
    })
#>        Body Site   bray.min  bray.max
#> 1 Anterior nares 0.21357850 0.8957952
#> 2  Buccal mucosa 0.11132016 0.7878359
#> 3     Mid vagina 0.04589041 1.0000000
#> 4         Saliva 0.37105391 0.6975318
#> 5          Stool 0.40223744 0.9739696
